subject: Customer Enquiry Regarding Import Fees
description_text:
Hi,

I live in the UK and I am thinking of buying from your website.

I wanted to know if I need to pay import duty when placing an order on
your website, it says you are UK based but other places say it is a
Chinese brand hence my confusion.....

Are the products stocked in the UK and not subject to duty?

See screenshot attached of what I would like to purchase.



On a side note I am using "black45" as a discount code, however if you
have a better one would you be kind enough to send that one over?

Thank you very much for your time and I look forward to hearing from you.

Kind regards

Robert Hamilton

conversations.body_text: Hi Rob H,    Yes, there is no duty payable on orders placed in the UK, so please do not worry.

Thanks for your prompt reply. I am happy to hear this, thank you. I
will go ahead and place my order now.

Kind regards

Rob.
